data.title: CEST time zone â€” Central European Summer Time
data.meta_description: What time is it CEST? Check exact current time and discover the key facts about Central European Summer Time
data.text:
CEST (Central European Summer Time) is one of the well-known names of UTC+2 time zone which is 2h. ahead of UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).The time offset from UTC can be written as +02:00.

It's used as a DST (summer daylight saving time).During the winter, CET - Central European Time(UTC+1) is in use.

Some locations use CET all year long.
